You are a Pirate! Pirates fight back.

The Fish Stick is rancid.
Pure toxin.
Your body rejects it violently.
FFightSucces:
The frozen Fish Stick cracks against Billy's skull.
You can win this!
FFightFail:
How did you miss?!
He's right there!

Your legs won't obey.
There's nowhere left to run.
